spells.name: Analyze Dweomer
spells.description: Reveals magical aspects of subject.

spells.name: Animate Objects
spells.description: Objects attack your foes.

spells.name: Cat's Grace, Mass
spells.description: As cat's grace, affects 1 subject/level.

spells.name: Charm Monster, Mass
spells.description: As charm monster, but all within 30 ft.

spells.name: Cure Moderate Wounds, Mass
spells.description: Cures 2d8 damage + 1/level, affects 1 subject/level.

spells.name: Eagle's Splendor, Mass
spells.description: As eagle's splendor, affects 1 subject/level.

spells.name: Eyebite
spells.description: Target becomes panicked, sickened, and/or comatose.

spells.name: Find the Path
spells.description: Shows most direct way to a location.

spells.name: Fox's Cunning, Mass
spells.description: As fox's cunning, affects 1 subject/level.

spells.name: Geas/Quest
spells.description: As lesser geas, but affects any creature.

spells.name: Heroes' Feast
spells.description: Food for one creature/level cures and grants combat bonuses.

spells.name: Irresistible Dance
spells.description: Forces subject to dance.

spells.name: Permanent Image
spells.description: Permanent illusion, includes sight, sound, smell, and thermal effects.

spells.name: Programmed Image
spells.description: As major image, plus triggered by event.

spells.name: Project Image
spells.description: Illusory double can talk and cast spells.

spells.name: Scrying, Greater
spells.description: As scrying, but faster and longer.

spells.name: Shout, Greater
spells.description: Devastating yell deals 10d6 sonic damage; stuns creatures.

spells.name: Summon Monster VI
spells.description: Summons extraplanar creature to fight for you.

spells.name: Sympathetic Vibration
spells.description: Deals 2d10 damage/round to freestanding structure.

spells.name: Veil
spells.description: Changes appearance of group of creatures.
